data.meta_description: Ponycanyon Music Publishing offers copyright administration, licensing, creative service, and master recording licensing.
data.text:
Profile

KOHTA YAMAMOTO

composer / Arranger

KOHTA YAMAMOTO has worked with top anime creators in Japan. He has scored a number of animated works, including "Attack on Titan: Final Season" and "The Seven Deadly Sins: from Season2 to Season4," and composed music for various artists and advertisements.

His scores emphasize storytelling and emotion to draw viewers into the worldview of the content.

Profile

Shun Narita

composer / arranger / Guitarist

As a guitarist and bassist, Shun Narita developed the Vocaloid "Mayu" early in his career.

He is now firmly in the mainstream of soundtrack music composition for films, animation and games.

Profile

Yusuke Seo(a/k/a:Starving Trancer / Xceon)

composer / Arranger / Pianist / Artist

Yusuke Seo was trained in classical piano from the age of six, and began studying synthesizer programming and music composition from the age of 16.

He launched his professional career after working for a recording studio and music label and has composed numerous soundtracks for games and animation, as well as music for various artists.

Profile

Shota Kowashi

composer / Drummer

Shota Kowashi holds a degree from the Graduate School of the Tokyo University of the Arts.

He is known for his iconic style of innovative, rhythmic compositions based on percussion and jazz techniques. He has composed background music for many works that have won awards.

Profile

shinnosuke nakasone

Composer / Arranger

shinnosuke nakasone started his career as a composer and sound producer in 2016 after shining with the cult rock band Mushi Furu Yoru Ni as a guitarist and composer. He has composed many pop tunes, such as the girls' rock band BiSH's "Saraba kana" and as a sound producer of the girls' idol group NELN. In addition, he has scored a diversity of background music for advertisements, fashion shows, etc. He has a good reputation for his very contemporary sound and worldview.
